contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 1, 1874 M Windy Nook Contest Rematch
Windy Nook Contest Rematch 0 March Contest
windy-nook-contest-rematch
None
Bedlington, Northumberland Referee: Thomas Hogg, of Hartlepool.
A rematch of the Windy Nook march contest of earlier in the year was arranged between the committees of these two bands, as recounted in "The History of St. Hilda's Band". One judge was appointed by each band, and it was held on neutral ground. The format was identical to the earlier contest, with each band playing the same two own choice marches, and alternating performances, i.e. Dennison's played 1 and 3, while West Wylam played 2 and 4.
Aug. 26, 2015, 9:42 a.m. Aug. 26, 2015, 9:46 a.m.
1 St. Hilda Colliery John Dennison March: The Vacant Chair
2 West Wylam Unknown March: The Vacant Chair
